definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: The two most common types of igneous rocks are granite and basalt.
sentences.chinese: 兩種最普遍的火成岩是花崗岩和玄武岩。

sentences.english: The continental crust has an average composition similar to that of the igneous rock, andesite.
sentences.chinese: 一般說來大陸地殼的組成成分是火成岩和安山岩。

sentences.english: Irruptive rock body reservoir is one of important volcanic rock reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 在火成岩系列中最常見的侵入體是花崗岩。

sentences.english: It’s built on volcanic rock and ash.
sentences.chinese: 該城建立在火成岩與火山灰上。

sentences.english: Contrast the formation of intrusive and extrusive igneous rocks.
sentences.chinese: 對比形成的侵擾和擠壓火成岩。

sentences.english: The undissolved potassium mineral deposits is mainly classified to the sedimentary rock and the igneous rock.
sentences.chinese: 河南不溶性鉀礦主要屬於沉積岩型和火成岩型。

sentences.english: Igneous drape reservoir is a special type of reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 火成岩披覆油藏是一種特殊的油藏類型。

sentences.english: Trap rock is a form of plutonic igneous rock.
In geology, igneous rocks were once hot liquid.
sentences.chinese: 譯在地質學中，火成岩曾是熾熱的液體。

sentences.english: Any igneous rock with crystals embedded in a finer groundmass of minerals.
sentences.chinese: 任何含有嵌入緻密的礦物基質的火成岩。

sentences.english: The activity of igneous rocks mainly concentrates in Neogene and Quaternary.
sentences.chinese: 火成岩活動主要集中在晚第三紀和第四紀。

sentences.english: Well Da72 is a high yield well after acidizing treatment in igneous rock of Es3.
sentences.chinese: 大72井是在沙三段火成岩酸化後出油的高產井。

definition: rhyolite (extrusive igneous rock, chemically equivalent to granite)
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
